landingPage.name: Inoru Akhmad.
landingPage.description: I am a graduate of a vocational high school in software engineer, with a strong emphasis on enhancing my skills. I aspire to build my future in the IT industry and constantly strive to develop myself to stay up to date with the latest technologies.

zse.title: State Vocational High School 1 Surabaya
zse.content: Thanks to my education at this institute, I gained a solid foundation in software engineering. This experience broadened my horizons and provided me with extensive knowledge about databases, as well as desktop and web application development.

merinosoft.content: Development of a web application relating to the management of employees in a company.

ebrand.content: Development of a distributed microservices-based system relating to online brand protection. Integration with multiple external APIs.

shopSystem.title: Food Reciepe
shopSystem.content: Food recipe website application. This project was created to manage food recipes. The folder directory is arranged neatly.

snakeWebApp.title: Rent a football field
snakeWebApp.content: This application is used to assist field rental payment methods based on rental hours and field type. This application has extensive user account functionality, along with a comprehensive and feature-rich admin page.

snakeGame.title: Blog App
snakeGame.content: This application is designed to make it easy for bloggers to create, edit and publish content quickly and efficiently. Apart from that, users can also enjoy various interesting articles from various topic categories. With a focus on interactivity, content editing, and an attractive appearance, this project aims to improve the user experience for both bloggers and readers.

minesweeper.title: Clinic Management System
minesweeper.content: Website-based Clinic Management Application. This application was created with the aim of assisting in the appointment process with doctors, has good features and infrastructure
